data.current_description: Signs a receipt and stores it in the "Datenerfassungsprotokoll".
data.summary_suggestion: Sign and store a receipt in the data log

Accepts Belegdaten containing receipt line items, payments, and discounts. Returns the complete SignierteBelegdaten object with cryptographic signature and storage confirmation. This operation creates a permanent, tamper-evident record of the transaction.
